string.value: An ancient ring of wondrous power. There appears to be a faded inscription along the side..."Subani". Provides a boost of +8 W. Att, +15 M. Att, +12 Def/M. Def. for 8 minutes.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A jewel crafted by Prendergast for his daughter, intended as a protective gift for her 16th birthday.

string.value: A tasty, hot smore. Perfect for a toasty Halloween night! [Restores 25% HP/MP and gives a boost of +10 to Avoidability, Jump and Speed for 10 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Strength of a Glittering Stone

string.value: A hole was made in a coconut, and a straw's been stuck in. Drinking the cool juices through the straw will quench your thirst. It restores 100 HP.

string.name: desc

string.value: A delicious scoop of stuffing. This treat comes around only once in a while so eat it up before it gets cold. \n[Restores 600 HP/ 600 MP]

string.value: A stinky dish made with Cursed Frog Eggs. Increases 400 HP if eaten.

string.name: desc
string.value: A non-alcoholic wine made by the Witch using Cursed Cat Spittle. Increases 200 MP when consumed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A creepy and slimy Canape that the Witch has made for you. Increases Weapon ATT and Weapon DEF +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A suspiciously sharp-tasting Kabab that the Witch has made for you. Increases Magic Attack And Magic DEF +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Witch's wrap dish that fills your mouth with the aroma of the swamp with each bite. Increases Weapon ATT and Weapon DEF +25 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rough leather steak that the Witch has carefully grilled for you. Increases Magic Attack And Magic Defense +25 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Witch's special stew that gives off a sour stink. Increases Weapon and Magic Attack +40, Weapons and Magic DEF +100, and Speed and Jump +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment the sweet scent of rose touched my body, my head began to ache, and my body began to feel heavy in a hurry. I better go see Lana before the scent evaporates.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment the sweet scent of Freesia touched my body, my head began to ache, and my body began to feel heavy in a hurry. I better go see Lana before the scent evaporates.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment the sweet scent of lavender touched my body, my head began to ache, and my body began to feel heavy in a hurry. I better go see Lana before the scent evaporates.

string.value: A huge roasted turkey leg. It's so big that it seems like it would take all day to finish eating.\n[Gives +30 Physical Attack for 3 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: A chest with a guardian dragon carved on it. According to legend, this belonged to an ancient dragon master.\nDouble-click to acquire the dragon master's treasures.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's the absolute truth, but it really hurts. It might be better to not know the truth, for what you don't know can't hurt you. Provides WEAPON ATT +10 and MAGIC ATT +8 in your enraged state, but you suffer -50 MP for mental trauma.

string.name: desc
string.value: What you don't know can't hurt you. If the truth is too much to handle, avoiding it may be wise. It provides Critical +10 in your consideration for others, but you suffer -80 HP because of the anxiety that comes after telling a lie.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ancient glacial water collected from the Ice Cliff in El Nath. It never freezes no matter how cold it gets and has the ability to restore the health of Hoblins.\nRestores Shammos's health.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can get a new item by clicking it.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can get a new item by clicking it.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nIncreases the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of you and your party members for 10 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nDecreases the Attack Speed and Movement Speed of the opposing party members for 10 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cAn item for Ad Balloon Hunts#\r\nInstalls and activates a Time Bomb in the hunting field. Affected opponents will be stunned for 3 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Medicine made by Vita. Weapon Attack +3, Magic Attack +5, and Speed +10 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A carbonated drink made by Surl. Perfect for a hot day! Recovers 1000 HP and 1000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: An acorn that can be obtained from the Fruit Trees in Edelstein. Recovers 70 HP and 70 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: 쌀가루만으로 반죽하여 반든 송편이다. 한 입 깨물면 한가위의 정취를 물씬 느낄 수 있다.\n#chp/mp 400씩 회복#

string.name: desc
string.value: 쌀가루와 쑥즙으로 반죽하여 반든 송편이다. 한 입 깨물면 향긋한 쑥내음과 한가위의 정취를 물씬 느낄 수 있다.\n#chp/mp 800씩 회복#

string.name: desc
string.value: 쌀가루와 오미자시럽으로 반죽하여 반든 송편이다. 한 입 깨물면 향긋한 새콤달콤한 오미자향과 한가위의 정취를 물씬 느낄 수 있다.\n#chp/mp 1200씩 회복#

string.name: desc
string.value: 쌀가루와 치자물로 반죽하여 만든 송편이다. 한 입 깨물면 한가위의 정취를 물씬 느낄 수 있다.\n#chp/mp 1600씩 회복#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a legendary Secret Remedy. \nIt fully recovers HP and MP, but if your maximum HP and MP exceed 99, 999, then 99,999 HP and MP will be restored.

A long, thin, baked rice cake. Tasty!

You can feel the high expectations that Dr. Kim has for those who have great potential.

string.name: desc
string.value: All the cool kids use hair wax. You...do want to be cool, don't you?

string.name: desc
string.value: Carrot juice is good for your eyes. Also, it's yummy.

string.name: desc
string.value: This soup will make you strong like a snake. A strong snake.

string.name: desc
string.value: This sanitizer will clean your hands. You know what they say about clean hands.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nothing like a cup of Joe to take you back...

string.name: desc
string.value: Cologne to make you more attractive. The more, the better.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Archangel's blessing grands you Weapon/Magic ATT +5. Other Weapon/Magic buffs can stack with this one.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Dark Angel's blessing grants you Weapon/Magic ATT +10. Other Weapon/Magic buffs can stack with this one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A prize for participating in Maple Idol. There are goodies inside!

string.value: Wise words from an old Moon Bunny. They fill you with confidence. Weapon ATT +10 and Magic ATT +10 for 20 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Archangel's blessing grands you Weapon/Magic ATT +5. Other Weapon/Magic buffs can stack with this one.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've received the Champion bonus. Avoid getting eliminated for 1 min to receive extra experience.

string.name: desc
string.value: You go into a Rage! ATT and DEF increase for 2 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Four-leafed Clover that the bunny likes

string.name: desc
string.value: An aura given to people with perfect attendance in the new semester event. Cannot be canceled with the right mouse button. Weapon/Magic ATT +20 for 30 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Rain dangerous matrimonial bliss upon your enemies. Weapon/Magic ATT +20 for 30 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cup full of spicy yet tasty rice cakes. Increases ATT by 8 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A wonderful snack that tastes like a combination of soda pop and chicken nuggets. Increases Magic ATT by 8 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exactly 10 inches of delicious frozen goodness. Increases Speed by 15 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tasty squid basted with butter, then roasted over an open flame. Increases Avoidability by 400 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweet cotton candy that looks as soft as the clouds in the sky. Increases Accuracy by 400 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A puffy snack made with rice. Nice and crunchy! Increases Weapon Defense by 400 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A balloon full of helium gas. Makes you feel much lighter when you hold it, like you could float away... Increases Jump by 10 for 10 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box full of all kinds of yummy food. Increases ATT by 10, Magic ATT by 10, Speed by 15, and Jump by 10 for 15 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gaga's watermelons are ripe with power! Increases ATT/Magic ATT by 20, Weapon/Magic DEF by 200, and HP by 500 for 1 hour. Can be stacked with other buffs, aside from watermelon buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gaga's watermelons are bursting with power! Increases ATT/Magic ATT by 30, Weapon/Magic DEF by 300, and HP by 1000 for 1 hour. Can be stacked with other buffs, aside from watermelon buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gaga's watermelons contain unimaginable power! Increases ATT/Magic ATT by 40, Weapon/Magic DEF by 400, and HP by 1500 for 1 hour. Can be stacked with other buffs, aside from watermelon buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Kenta wants to help, so he'll share his lunch with you! Increases ATT by 30, Weapon/Magic DEF by 500, Speed by 10, and Jump by 10 for 3 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruity sundae that will keep you cool in the summer heat.\nRestores 1500 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Forget regular hair wax. All the cool kids use PREMIUM hair wax now.

string.name: desc
string.value: For premium eyes, premium carrot juice is where it's at. The taste is also premium, of course.

string.name: desc
string.value: This soup, made by boiling snake bones for 2 days straight, will grant you amazing, snake-like powers. At least, that's what they say.

string.name: desc
string.value: Are your hands extra filthy? Of course they are. That's why hand sanitizer comes in extra-strength now. Because of you.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's pretty much like coffee, but makes you feel fancy when you drink it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong, sweet scent to cover your natural aroma of sweat and monster bits.

string.name: desc
string.value: For Lv. 30 or below! Enjoy a delicious drumstick and build strength. Weapon/Magic ATT +20, HP/MP +300, and Speed +20 for 30 minutes. Can be stacked with other buffs except for Nutritious Drumstick.

string.name: desc
string.value: For Lv. 31 to Lv. 70! Enjoy a delicious drumstick and build strength. Weapon/Magic ATT +30, HP/MP +500, and Speed +20 for 30 minutes. Can be stacked with other buffs except for Nutritious Drumstick.

string.name: desc
string.value: For Lv. 71 or higher! Enjoy a delicious drumstick and build strength. Weapon/Magic ATT +40, HP/MP +800, and Speed +20 for 30 minutes. Can be stacked with other buffs except for Nutritious Drumstick.

string.name: desc
string.value: A buff to commemorate the Maple Heritage Day. For 15 minutes, ATK and MATK increase by 30.

string.name: desc
string.value: HP +500 and Weapon/Magic DEF +100 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: HP +1000 and Weapon/Magic DEF +200 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: HP +1500 and Weapon/Magic DEF +300 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A buff to celebrate the Legends Awards. Weapons/Magic ATT +20, Speed +20, and Jump +10 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Archangel's blessing grants you Weapon/Magic ATT +12. Other Weapon/Magic buffs can stack with this.

string.name: desc
string.value: You helped develop the Monster Mop-Up device, and enjoyed some peace and quiet. HP +100, Weapon/Magic ATT +10, Speed +10 for 30 minutes. Can be stacked with other buffs.

string.name: desc

string.value: A bomb for use at the Great Competition of Ariant. If you are hit by the explosion, you will lose Soul Gems.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bundle that enables you to summon a small, handmade snowman. The summoned snowman will melt and disappear in 3 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unwrap this sack, and the aliens will bring doom to the world of Maple.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maze Snail set, including 5 types of snails for a total of 25 snails.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maze Transformation Snail Set, including 3 types of snails for a total of 3, but they change their look every 3 seconds.

string.name: desc

string.value: Saint Savior Mini Dungeon Summoning Sack

string.name: desc
string.value: There's no way to know which monster will be summoned, but according to Cassandra, there's a possibility a rare, powerful monster might be summoned here through the sack.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sack that Cassandra gave you as a gift. On it appears a note that reads "Open with Friends."

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon monsters (Snail(3), Red Snail(3), Blue Snail(3), Mossy Snail(2), Mano)

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon monsters (Wild Monkey, Mama Monkey, White Baby Monkey, White Mama Monkey, Lupin, Zombie Lupin, Faust)

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon monsters (Tiru, Murupa, Murukun, Ribbon Pig, Dark Stump, White Chicken, Desert Rabbit(f), Desert Rabbit(m), Scorpion, Crow, Stopnow)

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon monsters (Helmet Pepe, Roloduck, Fire Tusk, Melon Bubble Tea, Mango Bubble Tea, Triple Rumo, Electrophant, Fireman, Shadow Eye from Another Dimension, Octobunny, Tortie, Mummydog, Red Drake, Trucker)

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon monsters (Leader A, Soul Teddy, Charmer, Mist Knight, Mr.Anchor, Windraider, Cerebes, Taurospear, D. Roy, Yeti and Pepe, Homunscullo, Stormbreaker, Ghost Pirate, Kimera)

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon monsters (Snack Bar, Elliza, Snowman, Bigfoot, Alishar, Angry Frankenroid)

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Slimes, Pigs, Orange Mushrooms, Bubblings, Octopuses, Green Mushrooms, and Horny Mushrooms each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Drumming Bunnies, Ligators, Ratz, Star Pixie's, Jr. Wraith's, and Jr. Pepe's each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Panda Teddy's, King Bloctopuses, Lorangs, Zombie Lupins, Hellies, and Tweeters each.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Mushmoms, Red Drakes, Ice Drakes, Master Soul Teddy's, and Dark Yeti's each.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Lycanthropes, Death Teddy's, Gigantic Spirit Vikings, and G. Phantom Watches each.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 5 Bains, 2 Jr. Balrogs, and 1 Crimson Balrog.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons one of each monsters featured in Monster Attack Level 1 ~ Level 3.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons one of each monsters featured in Monster Attack Level 4 ~ Level 7.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a golden bell that summons monsters. You can ring the bell by #cdouble-clicking# it to summon marvelous monsters. This cannot be used \nnear portals, in villages, where no monster appears, on Teleport and maps that forbid summoning.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shining marble where the Fluorescent Ghost hides. You can summon the Florescent Ghost by #cdouble-clicking#. You cannot use it near \nVillages or portals.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains a poisoned monster. Use it to remove the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a bomb which will enable one to steal wool from the sheep.

string.name: desc
string.value: Plants rose thorns for protection from wolves.

string.name: desc
string.value: Designated for bonus map of restricted area of subway station

string.name: name
string.value: Summon Sack for Jr. Yeti Pharaoh

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons Jr. Yeti Pharaoh for bonus stage of Nett's Pyramid (easy, normal, hard)

string.name: name
string.value: Summon Sack for Jr. Yeti Pharaoh

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons Jr. Yeti Pharaoh for bonus stage of Nett's Pyramid (berserk)

string.name: desc
string.value: Small pets love them. Recovers 30 Fullness. NOT for human!

string.name: desc
string.value: A high-quality dry treat that the Pigmies love. Pets love them, too.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on the item to send a New Year's card to a character of your choice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious elixir made by Moira which enables anyone that drinks this potion to temporarily transform into a dragon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret remedy that will transform you into Tigun the guard.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special shell that you can get from Mano. It is said that it makes wishes come true...

string.name: desc
string.value: Your body feels lighter, and in no time, you will be floating in the air. Oh no! You’re a ghost!

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet shaped like a ghost, and it is not known what it is made out of. It is said that it has special abilities.

string.name: desc
string.value: A doll that was thrown away by Sophelia a long time ago, but the masked gentleman found and revived it. If you stroke its head, you can turn into Sophelia for 3 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The minute you drink this, you will turn into a superhuman.

string.name: desc
string.value: The minute you drink this, you will turn into a superhuman.

string.name: desc
string.value: Taking this will transform you into a small and cute mouse.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily transforming as a dragon, even with the skill set of an aging Halfring (Corba). The transformatino includes an ability to fly.

string.name: desc
string.value: The more you look at it, the more you feel lightheaded… and you feel closer to the moon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, delicious rice cake. Sometimes creates an interesting set of powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment you drink this potion, you'll become the biggest star in the world of Maple, Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A transformation potion from the masked gentleman that allows you to transform into Peto for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: No one knows what you'll transform into when you drink this, but something WILL happen for one hour. It's all about the risk...

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on this to transform a character of your choice. Which one? Try it and find out!

string.name: desc
string.value: Popular lunar new year item, loved by everyone. It has a secret magic power that will give you a surprise.

string.name: desc
string.value: Popular lunar new year item, loved by everyone. It has a secret magic power that will give you a surprise.

string.name: desc
string.value: Popular lunar new year item, loved by everyone. It has a secret magic power that will give you a surprise.

string.value: Popular lunar new year item, loved by everyone. It has a secret magic power that will give you a surprise.

string.name: desc
string.value: I transformed into Geppetto from the folk tale. I felt a bit sluggish, but I tried my best to escape the dungeon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Make you transform into Pinocchio for 30 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture given by Cody of himself. I get a feeling something fun will happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture of a delicious cake that Cody gave as a gift. I get a feeling something funny with happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: When the mysterious form of power from the crystal statue gets absorbed into my body, I cease to become myself.

string.name: desc
string.value: An offensive-looking leech costume. Can be worn to trick your friends.

string.value: Transforms you into a little Snowman.

string.value: You've put on the Diving Equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 1 to level 30. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains enough EXP to take a character from level 30 to level 70. If you level up after using it and there's still EXP left in the item, you can use it again. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of Moon Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of Star Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of gold. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Engagement Ring made of silver. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of the stone from the moon and diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of the stone from the moon and 2 Karat diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of the stone from the moon and 3 Karat diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of the stone from the star and diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of gold and diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of gold and 2 Karat diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of gold and 3 Karat diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of silver and diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of silver and 2 Karat diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It is an arrangement ring made of silver and 3 Karat diamond. It is good to use when you propose marriage to someone you love.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume created by Kenta using Pheromone. Enables the user to tame hogs down at the Korean Folk Village.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch decorated with gems. Its special ability will catch ghosts that are hovering around when you double click it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A specialized tool in alchemy that changes into a gem when it absorbs the strength of a monster. The inside looks kind of transparent.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cane that can tame the lost reindeer, Rudolph.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special, magical marble that can absorb a poisoned monster and trap it inside the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special, magical marble that can absorb a poisoned monster on the 1st floor and trap it inside the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special, magical marble that can absorb a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor and trap it inside the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special, magical marble that can absorb a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor and trap it inside the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish net intended to catch something. Can be used with Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A green ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A purple ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hodori.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hogul.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Growlie.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Tiger.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net that Robinson gave you. You can use it to catch fishes in Aqua Road.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small ball that can be used to capture aliens.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net used for catching a Serpent that has been weakened. Double-click on it to catch a weakend Serpent.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong cage made of metal. Double-click on it to catch Eleanor's pet after it has been weakened.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used for catching a weakened Ribbon Pig. Double-click on it to catch the pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sack for capturing weakened Ligators. Double-click to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire Hero's Will.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh from the fertile earth back in Maple Island! The fishes simply love these baits!

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the EXP and Meso earned by fishing by 1.5 times! Don't try to eat it just because it is too delicious!

string.name: name
string.value: Traditional Fishing Bait For Fishing Assistant Use Only

string.name: desc
string.value: Magical Fishing Bait that can only be used by Fishing Assistant. Limited purchase of Traditional Fishing Bait on daily basis. All Fishing Baits must be utilized fully before next purchase.

string.name: name
string.value: Surpreme Fishing Bait For Fishing Assistant Use Only

string.name: desc
string.value: Supreme Fishing Bait which is the favourite for all fishes, this special bait is able to increase the yield of your catch.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bullet made out of special armors used by the Army of Robots. Mainly consists of a mysterious form of energy from space. The surface of the bullet features a unique design.\r\nAttack +22

string.name: desc
string.value: Bullets made of steel. Once they run out, they need to be recharged.\n\nAttack +22

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a Bullet made out of white gold. There's a bunch of them stored inside, and you'll need to recharge them after they're all used up. \n\nATT + 22

string.name: desc
string.value: A capsule used in rapid flame attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: A capsule used in rapid ice attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Subani's sacred Scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Cursed Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted even if the scroll fails. However, if using a cursed Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it to expand the Character Slots in the #ccurrent server# by #c1 slot#. (Will not expand if max has been reached.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it to expand the Character Slots in the #ccurrent server# by #c1 slot#. (Will not expand if max has been reached.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Your body feels lighter, and in no time, you will be floating in the air. Oh no! You’re a ghost!

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet shaped like a ghost, and it is not known what it is made out of. It is said that it has special abilities.

string.value: Use it one copy at a time, and a mysterious aura will surround your body and bless you. Collect 20 of these to read the contents of the book.

string.name: desc
string.value: The pop quiz will be based on Knights of Cygnus, it may bring more than just good luck to those that answer the questions correctly. Click on the book to start the quiz.

string.name: desc
string.value: Resets the Gold Key Room in Richie Gold's Maze.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to check your current position, along with the spot of the Gold Key Room.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of paper featuring a myriad of illegible scribbles.\n#cDouble-click on it to start the quest.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A compass that does not have anything marked on it. Gather up the #cletters N,E,W, and S for the compass#, however, and this may transform into a useful compass afterall.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gold compass that will guide one to the Treasure Island in Gold Richie. \n#cDouble-click the item# to be transported to the Treasure Island.

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume that contains the scent of a young explorer. \n#cDouble-click on it# to spray it and fool the monster in the process.

string.name: desc
string.value: A relic with an unknown date of origin.\n#cDouble-click# to find out.

string.name: desc
string.value: A freezing-cold ice bar that allows one to tranform into Peng Peng. There's no way to control what kind of Peng Peng you'll transform into.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful chemical extracted from Poison Mushroom. It has the ability to remove the barrier in the forest.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic powder that eliminates the spine from the vine.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is an ice box full of things to blow your heat away. If you don't open it before the event period ends, then its contents will all melt away.

string.name: desc
string.value: A polaroid that takes pictures of the moon. Stand near the full moon near town, then double-click the polaroid to snap a shot. If failed, you can obtain another one through Baby Moon Bunny.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black pouch from Ibech, a member of Black Wings. Apparently all I need to do is open it in front of the Safe...

string.value: An item that can be used to reset during an emergency.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A tasty watermelon obtained from the Tasty Watermelon Pot. Better enjoy it before it goes bad!
#cDouble-click on it to obtain
an Alarm Clock (Right) and one of the following buffs:
-Lv. 30 or below-
ATT/M. ATT +20
Weapon/Magic DEF+200
HP+500
-Lv. 31-70-
ATT/M. ATT +30
Weapon/Magic DEF +300
HP +1000
-Lv. 71 or higher-
ATT/M. ATT +40
Weapon/Magic DEF +400
HP +1500
Buffs can be stacked with other buffs, aside from additional watermelon buffs.#

string.value: Mimir's Well Water, prepared especially for Cannon Shooters. You can't consume more than 100 of them and you can only consume them until 2012/7/1.\n#cWhen consumed by a Cannon Shooter, EXP will increase by 10% before level 50. From level 50 to 99, EXP will increase by 5%. It can't be consumed at level 100 or higher.#

string.value: Spiegelmann's Hot Air Balloon 15 days Coupon

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Spiegelmann's Hot Air Balloon] for 15 days.

string.name: name
string.value: Spiegelmann's Hot Air Balloon 1 year Coupon

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Spiegelmann's Hot Air Balloon] for 1 year.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Miwok Boy rescued from the Disappearing Jungle.

string.name: desc
string.value: This treasure sack is...not very impressive. #cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside. Make sure to open it by 05/09/12!

string.name: desc
string.value: What a shiny treasure sack! #cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside. Make sure to open it by 05/09/12!

string.name: desc
string.value: The glint of gold from this treasure sack sets your heart to pounding. #cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside. Make sure to open it by 05/09/12!

string.name: desc
string.value: Diamonds?! Where did they find DIAMONDS?! #cDouble-click# on it to see what's inside. Make sure to open it by 05/09/12!

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the [Miwok Hog] riding skill for 30 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: A taming coupon which grants you use of Snow White. Wild Hunters riding Snow White get #c120 Speed, 120 Jump, and 50% Power Stance effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to use the Small Rabbit mount for 30 days.\n#cDouble-click# on it to use the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Infused with the powers of sunshine and joy. It bestows a blessing of substantial EXP,\n#cunless your character is already max level.#

string.name: desc
string.value: With additional patience, the Essence of Patience shines brighter than ever.

string.name: desc
string.value: 마법의 할로윈 나무가 자라는 맵으로만 이동할 수 있는 순간 이동의 돌이다. 사용 횟수에 제한은 없으나 이벤트 기간 내에만 사용할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a surprise box for Halloween. There's no knowing what kind of present will pop out of it, but it can only be opened during the Halloween event period.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Bunny Buddy Buggy] for 1 year.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Bunny Buddy Buggy] for 15 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nice, plump box shaped like a nice, plump pumpkin. #cDouble-click# on it to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: 가면신사의 가방이다. 열어보기 전까진 어떤 것이 들어 있을지 알 수 없다. \n#c2011년 11월 17일#까지 사용 가능.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c더블클릭# 하면 #c7일# 동안 사용할 수 있는 라이딩 스킬 #c마녀의 빗자루#를 배울 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 먹으면 알수 없는 힘을 낼 수 있는 할로윈 마법의 사탕이다. 레벨에 따라 경험치를 상승시킨다. 단, 하루에 10개까지만 먹을 수 있으며, 할로윈 이벤트 기간이 끝나면 먹을 수 없다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 할로윈을 기념하여 만들어진 장인의 쿠폰. 사용 시 하나의 전문 기술을 다음 레벨로 올려준다.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you are lucky enough, you may obtain a powerful scroll from the reward box!

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Maximus] mount skill for 1 day starting today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Maximus] mount skill for 15 days starting today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Maximus] mount skill for 365 days starting today.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box given to the ones who have defeated Ani as a reward. Open the box to obtain various scrolls. However, those who are Lv. 140 or higher cannot obtain scrolls.

string.name: desc
string.value: A training guide from Luden, the Lion King's loyal knight. Grants the user a Mastery Book to enhance their skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box that can only be opened on the day after it was received. You can receive one a day from the Admin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A festive gift box that contains various Christmas items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small tree you grew yourself. Take it to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A vessel of purified light. Its power should be enough to destroy the magic barriers that Arkarium placed around the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 30-day Knight Chariot mount coupon.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to use the Knight Chariot riding skill for 30 days.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A bag of random items, dropped by monster trainees.

string.name: desc
string.value: You got the Dragon Gift Box, right? Click it to see what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for those who will be remembered as legends. \n#cDouble-click to view the contents.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box for those who will be remembered as legends. \n#cDouble-click to view the contents.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Premium Dungeon Ticket (One time only)\You can use it by double-clicking during the event period. A ticket will be disappeared once be used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Premium Dungeon Ticket (One time only)\You can use it by double-clicking during the event period. A ticket is only for Party members.

string.name: desc
string.value: An ominous box obtained after defeating a master monster. There may be something useful inside.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to see what's inside.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this will randomly take you to a spot in the maze.

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Gemstone Imp in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your imp by feeding it gear that's similar to your level. It will reward you when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Fortune Moon Bunny in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your imp by feeding it gear that's similar to your level. It will reward you when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Cultivate a 5th Anniversary Potted Mini Maple Tree in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your Potted Mini Maple Tree by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with a Golden Maple Fruit when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a Tasty Watermelon Pot in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your Tasty Watermelon Pot by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with Gaga's Tasty Watermelon when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a Tasty Watermelon Pot in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking this item after you have obtained Gaga's Tasty Watermelon from the First Tasty Watermelon Pot#.\nGrow your Tasty Watermelon Pot by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with Gaga's Tasty Watermelon when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to plant a Maple Coin Tree in your Item Pot. A Legends Maple Coin Tree consumes loot items or equipments obtained from the monsters that are in the same level range with you, and you will get a Golden Maple Fruit from the tree once it's fully grown. However, you can't receive anything from the tree after the event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cultivate a Potted Mini Maple Tree in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nFeed your Potted Mini Maple Tree gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with a Golden Maple Fruit when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Place this in your your Item Pot, give it water, and watch it grow!

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing this in your item pot will put the creature on the left of the pot to sleep for 3 more days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing this in your item pot will put the creature on the right of the pot to sleep for 3 more days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing this in your item pot will awaken the creature on the left of the pot after 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing this in your item pot will awaken the creature on the right of the pot after 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This rice ball will feed the creature on the left side of your item pot for the next 12 meals.

string.name: desc
string.value: This rice ball will feed the creature on the right side of your item pot for the next 12 meals.

string.name: desc
string.value: Put this item in your item pot to increase the creature on the left's likability by 10.

string.name: desc
string.value: Put this item in your item pot to increase the creature on the right's likability by 10.

string.value: At least Lv 50: 3xEXP buff for 60 minutes. /n Below Lv 49: 2xEXP buff for 60 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lucky Gift given by the Administrator. Increases EXP 2X for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: Multiplies your EXP by 3 for 60 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Admin's apologies for the events of January 1st. Use it to receive EXP x2 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Weekend benefit for people who have played more than 3 times from Monday through Friday. Can only be used until midnight.
#cDouble-click# to activate the buff.
#cDuration: 1 Hour
Effect: EXP x2

string.name: desc
string.value: The energy flowing from the Warrior's Star will place a 1.5x EXP buff on you for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: The energy flowing from the Wise Man's Star will place a 1.5x EXP buff on you for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing given to users who've returned to MapleStory during the Maple Return Event. 1.5x EXP buff for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing given to users who've started MapleStory during the Maple New Member Event. 2x EXP buff for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: The energy flowing from the Hunter's Star will place a 1.5x EXP buff on you for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing that will help you have a happy day by increasing your EXP by 1.5x for 1 hour.#cCan only be used on a Saturday.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing that will help you have a happy day by increasing your EXP by 1.5x for 1 hour.#cCan only be used on a Sunday.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessed item that helps you enjoy the Legend Festival on Saturdays; increases your EXP reward by 1.5 times for 1 hour.#cCan only be used on Saturdays.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessed item that helps you enjoy the Legend Festival on Sundays; increases your EXP reward by 1.5 times for 1 hour.#cCan only be used on Sundays.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to receive a #c1.5x EXP# buff for #c1 hour#. Cool as the winter snow.

string.name: desc
string.value: 거대 할로윈 나무가 선물한 경험치 1.5 배 쿠폰이다. #c더블클릭#해서 사용하면 #c1시간# 동안 #c경험치 1.5배# 버프가 걸린다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 할로윈 마녀 고양이가 떨어트린 경험치 1.5 배 쿠폰이다. #c더블클릭#해서 사용하면 #c1시간# 동안 #c경험치 1.5배# 버프가 걸린다.

string.value: #cDouble-click# to receive a #c1.5x EXP# buff for #c1 hour#.

string.value: Using this on a piece of equipment protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection disappears after a successful scroll use and it #ccannot be used on items that have been successfully enhanced 12 or more times.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that turns a weapon into a Soul Weapon, which grows in strength by absorbing the Soul Orbs of enemies.nWeapon Attack (ATT) and Magic Attack (M.ATT) can increase up to 10%, depending on the amount of absorbed Orbs.nCan only be used on Lv

null.name: . 100 or higher weapons that are fully upgraded.nSuccess Rate: 10%

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble containing Balrog's soul.nHas a chance to give a Soul Weapon additional powers, including a skill that draws from Balrog's strength.nSuccess Rate: 25%nFailure may cause the weapon to be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a Value Potion made with special ingredients. \nIt recovers 5,000 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a legendary Secret Remedy. \nIt recovers HP and MP by about 50%, but if your maximum HP and MP exceed 99,999, then 49,999 HP and MP will be restored.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a legendary Secret Remedy. \nIt fully recovers HP and MP, but if your maximum HP and MP exceed 99, 999, then 99,999 HP and MP will be restored.

string.name: desc
string.value: Small pets love this. Recovers 30 Fullness. NOT for human consumption!

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, sticky rice cake filled with delicious honey.\nRecovers 1500 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases ATT and Magic ATT.\nATT and Magic ATT +5 for 30 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Juice squeezed from fresh Strawberries. \nRestores 3000 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: This refreshment will completely drive away an excavation member's fatigue! Restores 3000 HP & MP.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh reindeer milk that’s been gathered and bottled. \nRecovers about 5,000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dewdrops collected at daybreak. Recovers about 4,000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pie made with a ripe apple that has been caramelized in sugar, wrapped in flour dough, and baked to a tasty brown color. Restores about 10,000 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collection of rare fairy tears. Recovers about 10,000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collection of dew drops that set in daybreak and lasted until sunset. Recovers about 5,000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Arkarium's death curse has been lifted!

string.name: desc
string.value: A 3x Giant Potion received after defeating the Giant Moon Bunny. What mysterious powers could it hold? \n#c* Caution: Use might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A 5x Giant Potion received after defeating the Giant Moon Bunny. What mysterious powers could it hold? \n#c* Caution: Use might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Resistance Potion made to celebrate the year of the dragon. Abnormal Status Resistance +10% for 2 hours on use. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time,

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases STR, DEX, INT, and LUK by 30, and Speed by 30, and Jump by 23 for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases ATT and M. ATT by 12 and can be used with other ATT potions. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that makes the imbiber invincible for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases item and meso drop rates by 10% for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases EXP gains by 10% for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion that contains the power of Chronos, a god of the ancient Giants. What mysterious powers does it hold? \n#c* Caution: Using it might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases STR, DEX, INT, LUK, Speed, and Jump by 20 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases ATT & M. ATT by 4 for 15 minutes. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases MAX HP by 2000 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion that blesses the chosen. Increases STR, DEX, INT, LUK, Speed, and Jump by 10 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion that contains the power of Chronos, a god of the ancient Giants. What mysterious powers does it hold? \n#c* Caution: Using it might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a 3X Giant Secret Remedy. What will happen when you take it? \n#c*Warning: Your buffs might disappear upon use.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a 5X Giant Potion. What will happen when you take it? \n#c*Warning: Your buffs might disappear upon use.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a mysterious potion which holds the power of Knosos, the god of ancient giants. What will happen when you take it? \n#c*Warning: Your buffs might disappear upon use.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a mysterious potion produced from alchemic technology. With this, you will become invincible for 20 seconds. Cooldown time is 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a mysterious potion produced from alchemic technology. With this, your Abnormal Status Resistance will increase by 30%. However, you may not use more than 1 potion at a time except if you are an alchemist, in which case you may use up to two.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a mysterious potion produced from alchemic technology. With this, your chance of obtaining items and Meso will increase by 10%. You may not use more than 1 potion at a time, but if you are an Alchemist, then you may use up to two.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a mysterious potion that holds the power of Gaia, the god of ancient giants. What will happen when you take it? \n#c*Warning: Your buffs might disappear upon use.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of gold-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it and defeat the Root Abyss Seal Guardian, Physical Attack and Magic Attack will increase by 20% for 1 hour. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of white-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it, your chance of obtaining Epic Items will skyrocket for 1 hour. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of black-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it, your chance of obtaining Unique Items will skyrocket for 1 hour. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of blue-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it, Mob Defense rate will be ignored by 20% for 1 hour. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of red-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it, Boss ATT will increase by 20% for 1 hour. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of rainbow-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it and defeat the Root Abyss Seal Guardian, you can obtain an additional Mysterious Leaf. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of gold-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it, Physical Attack and Magic Attack will increase by 20% for 1 hour. \n#cNote#\nYou cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of white-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it, your chance of obtaining Epic Items will skyrocket for 1 hour. \n#cNote#\nYou cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time.

string.name: desc

If you use it, Mob Defense rate will be ignored by 20% for 1 hour. \n#cNote#\nYou cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time.

If you use it, Boss ATT will increase by 20% for 1 hour. \n#cNote#\nYou cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a legendary potion said to be made by the Forest Fairy. It feels like a mysterious item because it holds pieces of rainbow-colored stars that shine very brightly. If you use it and defeat the Root Abyss Seal Guardian, you can obtain 2 additional Mysterious Leaves. 
#cNote#
You cannot use Secret Remedy and other types of Star Potions at the same time. 
This is only effective within the Root Abyss area.

string.name: desc
string.value: Immersed in the Halloween party atmosphere, your ATT and Magic Attack increase by 10 for 30 minutes. Overlaps with buffs other than Happy Halloween Day.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This buff is filled with cheers for the post season. 
#cDuration: 30 minutes
Physical Attack +10
Magic Attack +10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this Wax will make you feel more charismatic. Let's give it a try.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking this Carrot Juice will make your eyes feel better and sharpen your vision. Let's drink it all in one gulp.

string.name: desc
string.value: Eating this Snake Stew will make you feel powerful and strong-willed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this Hand Sanitizer will make your hands feel cleaner and more dexterous in performing tasks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking this Cup of Coffee will make you feel sentimental and more sensitive.

string.name: desc
string.value: Trying his Perfume will make you feel more attractive.

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this High Quality Wax will make you feel more charismatic. Let's give it a try.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking this Premium Carrot Juice will make your eyes feel better and sharpen your vision. Let's drink it all in one gulp.

string.name: desc
string.value: Eating this Snake Stew, which has been brewed for 48 hours, will make you feel powerful and strong-willed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this Extremely Powerful Hand Sanitizer will make your hands feel cleaner, and better at doing things with them.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking this smooth Cup of Cafe Latte will make you feel sentimental and more sensitive.

string.name: desc
string.value: Trying his Luxury Perfume will make you feel more attractive.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can only get this red potion at Monster Park Extreme. ATT increases by 20 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can only get this green potion at Monster Park Extreme. Striking speed increases for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can only get this red potion at Monster Park Extreme. Magic Attack increases by 20 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can only get this gold potion at Monster Park Extreme. Maximum HP and MP increase by 2,000, and experience points increase by 10% for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This buff is born from a Miwok Boy's gratitude. 
#cDuration: 30 minutes
Physical Attack +15
Magic Attack +15#

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a lovely blessing given to the members of Club Henesys. Increases character's ATT and Magic Attack. It can be applied with other buffs. 
#cDuration: 1 hour
Physical Attack +30
Magic Attack +30#

string.name: desc
string.value:
This is a wonderful blessing, which celebrates spring in Maple World. Increases character's A and magic power. It can be applied with other buffs. 
#cDuration: 1 hour
Physical Attack +20
Magic Attack +20#

string.name: desc
string.value: Item drop rate triples for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: This healthy dish is the signature menu of Gold Beach Restaurant. It enhances charisma, sensitivity, insight, willpower, hand skills, and attractiveness. \n#cYou can use it by doubling clicking it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Good deeds beget even more good deeds. Increases ATT and Magic Attack. This can also be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: This spicy, sweet Ginger Man Cookie was made with Earl Grey tea. \nRecovers about 3,000 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: This spicy, sweet Ginger Lady Cookie was made with Earl Grey tea. \nRecovers about 3,000 MP.

string.value: Grow Grow Mentee! HP and Maximum MP increases by 1,000 for 1 hour. This can be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grow Grow Mentee! HP and Maximum MP increases by 2,000 for 1 hour. This can be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grow Grow Mentee! HP and Maximum MP increases by 3,000 for 1 hour. This can be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: This mysterious buff was obtained at the PC Room's Monster Arena. It makes your body feel as light as a feather. Highly enhances moving speed and jumps for 20 minutes. This can also be used with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Small, round chocolate. It's rumored to be made by an Italian chocolatier. You feel energized once you pop this in your mouth. \n#cDuration: 20 minutes\ATT +30

string.value: HP +500 and Weapon/Magic DEF +100 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: HP +1500 and Weapon/Magic DEF +300 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cupcake made of spiderwebs from an old mansion. Strangely addictive...\n+15 STR for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Soup made of zombie guts. At least it looks pretty...?\n+15 DEX for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creepy cookie. Don't bite too hard or you may lose your teeth!\n+15 INT for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Candy shaped like a bat. Did somebody say this was made of guano?\n+15 LUK for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cake that looks like a haunted mansion. Made of the most vile ingredients possible. The frightening shape and taste draws forth the power within!!\n+15 All stats, +10 physical attack and +10 Magic attack for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: If the character who has purchased the Basic Value Pack purchases this, then the current experience points bonus and ATT/Magic Attack buff effect can be upgraded. You can also purchase for the remaining days of your Basic Value Pack, and it can be purchased and used in units of 1 day. Effects other than experience point bonus and ATT/Magic Attack buff are not applied. The currently applied upgrade information can be viewed through the Value Pack UI.#

string.name: desc
string.value: It's not... It wasn't me! Someone's stink is seeping in from somewhere. Those who smell this will have their maximum HP increase by 10% for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: What is this? Such refreshing scent of flowers.... It's so lovely it can hypnotize you. Those who smell this will have 10% of their maximum MP increase for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This synergy machine can create a #cMystery Mastery Book 1# by fusing 2 regular Mastery Books. \nMystery Mastery Books that you obtained as a result of the fusion are #cuntradeable.# You cannot register or fuse Mystery Master Books.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This synergy machine can synthesize 2 regular recipes to create #cJewel Craft-only Scroll#. 

#cObtainable Item#
Jewel Craft's
 Chaos Scroll 60%

Jewel Craft's
Miraculous Chaos Scroll 40%

Jewel Craft's
Positive Chaos Scroll 30%

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cRecipe sold by 100% Success Rate
NPCs cannot be used for this.
#

string.name: desc
string.value: This synergy machine can synthesize 2 types of Jewel Craft gems to create a different kind of Jewel Craft gem. \nThrough synthesis, it can create Grade S or A jewels, but you can also get the same kinds of jewels.

string.name: desc
string.value: This synergy machine can synthesize 2 regular scrolls to create #cMysterious Scroll Book#. The result of synthesis, Mysterious Scroll Book, is a #cnon-exchangeable# item. Some items such as Mysterious Scroll Book type items cannot be registered nor synthesized.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dragging and dropping this on an equipment item that has no additional options will provide a random additional option. Using it on an equipment item that has already obtained an additional option with the Resurrection Flame will reset the item's additional option. \r\nThe equipment item that initially used the Resurrection Flame will be limited to 5 uses of scissors.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #cupgraded equipment#.
More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10+ successes: 10%

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #can equipment item that has been upgraded#.
The higher number of successes, the better chance of applying advanced options.
If failed, the item is destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to #cteleport to most other locations through the World Map [W]#. 
Also allows you to #cmove to a map where a specified character is# if they are in the same world and channel. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Device that shows you an earthquake's epicenter. Double-click it to scan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweet candy filled with love. Consume it to obtain EXP. Since it's TOO sweet, you can only eat up to 5 a day. Cannot be used once the event period is over.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Luxurious-looking box that contains a scroll. Cannot be used once the event period is over.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special cheer given to newly reborn Dual Blades. Increases Max HP/MP for 30 minutes. Higher the level, higher the amount increased, and can be stacked with other buffs. It does not disappear from the inventory after use. Can be used as much as desired during the event period at 30-minute intervals.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter sent to you by an anonymous admirer in lieu of White Day. You can feel how much love was put into it...maybe you should open it...

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value:
A sweet potion made from Maple Syrup. Your level will determine how much HP and MP are restored. Not affected by potion related skills or potentials.
#cBelow Lv. 30: HP/MP +100
Lv. 30 - 69: HP/MP +300
Lv. 70 - 99: HP/MP +1000
Lv. 100 - 119: HP/MP +2000
Lv. 120 - 149: HP/MP +3000
Lv. 150 or higher: HP/MP +4000

string.name: desc
string.value: The Cannoneers are back in business! Increases Weapon Attack, Speed, and Jump for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift from beyond the stars for returning Legends. Allows you to teleport to any town, no matter the continent. Due to its fragile cellular structure, it implodes 24 hours after being touched. #cCan be used once every 30 minutes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Eight wonderful years, all summed up on one little card. Double-click to obtain massive EXP boosts, depending on your level.\n#cHas no effect on max level characters. Can be used until TKTKTK, the end of the event.#

string.value: This is a Supply Box given to warriors that work hard to prepare for the snow storm. This can only be used during the event period. There are various game items inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is hot cocoa personally made by Casandra herself. Drinking it will provide you with a certain amount of experience points depending on your level. You can only drink it during the event period. It is 20% experience points for levels below \n#c50, 10% from Lv. 50 to Lv. 99, 2% from Lv. 100 to Lv. 149, and 1% for those above Lv. 150. Characters above Lv. 200 (Cygnus Lv. 120) and those with Xenon Jobs cannot use this, but all other characters can drink 3 per day.#

string.name: desc
string.value: You can use the [Onyx Jaguar Riding] riding skill by double-clicking this. \n[Onyx Riding] allows you to double jump while riding, regardless of whether you possess the double jump skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can train the Onyx Jaguar by double-clicking it. When you ride it, you will receive #cMoving Speed 120, Jump 120, and Stance 50% effects#, and this Onyx Jaguar will be used instead of the currently available Jaguar.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a Shining Gift Box Santa that's been prepared for you. You will receive cool gifts upon #cdouble-clicking# it, but you can only open it until December 31st during the Christmas event period.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty stocking was hung in the item pot, and now it is filled with Christmas gifts! You will randomly receive one of many gifts upon #cdouble-clicking# it. This can only be opened until December 31st during the Christmas event period.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a special Gift Box given to Mentors. It looks like one can receive various rare items, but it can only be opened until July 31st, 2013. You can view its contents by \n#cdouble-clicking# it.

This has no effect for characters above Lv. 10,000.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a bundle that holds all the things Fluorescent Ghost stole. They are mostly shoes but sometimes you can find something totally unexpected. You can view the contents by #cdouble-clicking#.

string.value: Raise a cute Rainbow Fortune Moon Bunny in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nDouble-click on the item you obtained from the Fortune Moon Bunny to complete the Rainbow Sunday mission.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# on this to put Christmas Socks in the Item Pot and receive gifts. \nInsert items or equipment from monsters around your level into the Magic Christmas Socks. You'll receieve gift-filled socks after 30 minutes.

string.value: #cDouble-clicking# this allows you to receive presents from Christmas stockings hanging on the Item pot. \nYou can place war booty or equipment items of monsters with similar levels as the owner to fall asleep. After 30 minutes of sleeping, you will be rewarded with a stocking full of presents.
