string.name: desc
string.value: This is a Miracle Cube that resets the equipment item's Potential abilities, but for some reason I sense dark energy from it. People say that there is a chance that the level may #cgo down#... Could that be true? \n#cThis can only be used for items whose level is between Rare and Epic# \n#cHighest Level of Result: Epic#

string.name: desc
string.value: Breaks off ties with the original owner, allowing an item's exchange to another person just once. This can only be used for certain items and not on the sealed items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip armors that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Cap, shoulder accessory, clothes, pants, outfit, mantle, gloves, belt, shoes#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip weapons that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. Can only be used on equipment.\n#c Available slots: Weapon, shield, secondary weapon#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip accessories that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Pendant, ring, eye accessory, face, earrings, pocket#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip ETC equipment that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Medal, badge, dragon, Mechanic equipment#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip armors that are #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Cap, shoulder accessory, tops, bottoms, outfits, capes, gloves, belt, shoes#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip weapons that are for #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. Unable to use on the items that cannot be equipped/removed.\n#c Available slots: Weapon, shield, secondary weapon#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip accessories that are for #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Pendant, ring, eye accessory, face accessory, earrings, pocket#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip ETC equipments that are #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Medal, badge, dragon, Mechanic equipment#

string.name: desc
string.value: Rat Mouth packed this lunchbox for me. Eating it will increase ATTack, Defense, Jump, and Speed by 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-clicking will allow you to catch the tired Lalalung, but it's not really a bird, right?

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-clicking will allow you to catch the tired Kakalung, but it's not really a bird, right?

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a travel ticket I received along with the very first vacation. #cDouble-clicking# will transport you to Gold Beach.

string.name: desc
string.value: Secret Resistance Instruction. #cYou can check its contents by double-clicking it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing a hat whose level is higher than 100. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: name
string.value: Sealed Box (Body armor, upper garment, lower garment)

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing an armor whose level is higher than 100. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing shoes or gloves that are of levels higher than 100. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing weapons that are of levels higher than 100. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial weapon#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing a hat whose level is higher than 100. Open it very carefully. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor# or #cspecial recipe#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: name
string.value: Chaos Sealed box (Body armor, upper garment, lower garment)

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing an armor whose level is higher than 100. Open it very carefully. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor# or #cspecial recipe#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing shoes or gloves that are of levels higher than 100. Open it very carefully. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial Armor# or #cspecial recipe#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This box is sealed, containing weapons whose level is higher than 100. Open it very carefully. #cIf you are lucky#, you may obtain the very rare #cspecial weapons# or #cspecial recipe#... Ready to test your luck?

string.name: desc
string.value: This potion can only be obtained via Sealed Box. It contains the power of Radiance Moonfall Potion of Root Abyss Garden. Drinking this will increase Physical Attack by 20, Magic Attack by 20, HP by 2,000, MP by 2,000, and Defense by 200 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a very worn out Old Village Summoning Scroll. It looks as though it might rip to pieces any moment.

string.name: desc
string.value: This just looks too suspicious. They say there's minerals inside, but…

string.name: desc
string.value: This just looks too suspicious. They say there's herbs inside, but…

string.name: desc
string.value: This amazing coupon will repair equipment anytime, anywhere upon use!

string.name: desc
string.value: This potion can only be obtained via Sealed Box. It contains the mysterious Moonfall power of Root Abyss Garden. Drinking it will instantly wind back time for you, randomly going to Lv. 1~10. \n Note: This can only be used #conce# throughout your entire life. #cTake caution.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is an Invincible Potion for the Operator's smooth taking of the test. Using it will make you invincible for 10 minutes. #cThis can only be used for local tests.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a Miracle Cube that resets the equipment item's Potential abilities but for some reason I sense dark force from it. People say that there is a chance that the level may #cgo down#... Could that be true? \n#cThis can only be used for items between Lv. Rare to Lv. Unique# \n#cHighest Level of Result: Unique#

string.name: desc
string.value: Designates the ability to use 'Final Strike' skill on Armors. \nFinal Strike: Additional 150% damage during strike

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the ATT of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: name
string.value: Chocolate Re-use Gloves Magic ATT Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the Magic ATT of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the Strength of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the Intelligence of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the Dexterity of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the Luck of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It amplifies the Abilities of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the Defense of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll can only be used on Valentine Bracelet. It enhances the Abilities of Valentine Bracelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: This item is used to add a socket to and item so that an Alien Nebulite can be added to it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to randomly increase or decrease stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats. Has a higher chance of granting better stats than regular Star Dust. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to randomly increase or decrease stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: 混有女媧的黃土的抽出物。往寶盒上灑的話，在寶盒灑上女媧的白土會設定為最高等級的能力值。比起女媧的黃土副產物有較高的機率調整到好的能力值。俠客的等級達120且寶盒的八卦是陽卦的話，等級會隨機上升或下降。

string.name: desc
string.value: Solidifies the effects of Star or Supernova Dust by locking the Core's current stats for 7 days. Cosmic Dust Solidifier can only be used to lock the current configuration once. \r\n#cWarning: The stat lock will be overwritten if you use an item to reconfigure the Core's stats.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 含有女媧能量的碎片。寶盒的能力值會往順時針方向輪轉一格。

string.name: desc
string.value: An ice chest full of goodies to help you stay cool in the summer time. The contents will melt if you don't open it up by TKTKTK.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exchange this coupon for a Pink Flower Tube (7 days) by TKTKTK.\n#cDouble-click on the ticket to make the exchange.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Spaceship] mount skill for 7 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to receive a Mesoranger Android.

string.name: desc
string.value: An EXP serum for Mesorangers. Increases EXP by 50%. \n#cHas no effect on max level characters.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift for fledgling Mesorangers. Can be used until 2013/04/23, when the contents will reconvert to pure energy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special capsule for the Resistance. Can be moved into storage and given to another character. The capsule will expire once the event has ended.\n#cSwallowing this capsule will give you 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 and below, 5% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. Cannot be used if you're under Lv. 10 or if you're Lv. 150 or higher (Cygnus Lv. 120).#

string.name: desc
string.value: A mighty cheer for the reborn Battle Mages. Increases Magic Attack and Max MP for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A primal cheer for the reborn Wild Hunters. Increases Weapon Attack and Max HP for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A supportive cheer for the reborn Mechanics. Increases Weapon Attack and Max HP for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special gift box given to the Maple BigWig players every month.\nExpiration: TKTKTK

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing potion from Battle Mode. Use it to obtain a chunk of EXP, depending on your level. #cHas no effect on characters under Lv. 10 and max level characters.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon issued from the 'New Character Support Headquarters' to help new characters settle down in Maple World. #cDouble-click# to obtain a coin item that can be exchanged for Mesos at the store. If you're lucky, you might get a huge payday!

string.name: desc
string.value: A pet coupon issued from the 'New Character Support Headquarters' to help new characters settle down in Maple World. #cDouble-click# to receive a pet that can be used for 30 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch made for a Battle Mode Gladiator. No one knows what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to learn the Pink Scooter mount skill for 7 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Something important seems to be written on this old scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unlike other normal lanterns, this lantern collects light.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special crystal that possesses the power to warp to Harmony, Aurora's hideout.

string.name: desc
string.value: A surprise gift from an Orange Mushroom.

string.name: desc
string.value: A microchip that changes the color of your mech's outer nanoweave. The programming is random, so there's no way to predict the color you'll get.

Improves attack on Knuckle.
Success rate:100% 
Weapon attack+5 
Weapon def.+1
STR+3

string.name: desc
string.value:
Improves attack on Gun.
Success rate:100% 
Weapon attack+5 
Accuracy +3
DEX+1

string.name: desc
string.value: You will have Weapon/Magic Attack, Weapon/Magic Defense +10 Buff Effect for 10 minutes when revived by Devil's Mercy

string.name: desc
string.value: It will increase your #cWeapon Attack# by #c10# for 30 minutes with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: It will increase the amount of #cEXP by 1.2 times for 30 minutes# with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: It will increase your #cWeapon Attack# by #c20# for 30 minutes with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: It will increase the amount of #cEXP by 1.5 times for 30 minutes# with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: It will increase the amount of #cEXP by 1.5 times for 1 hour# with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: It will increase the amount of #cEXP by 1.5 times# and your #cWeapon Attack by 30 for 1 hour# with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: It will #cdoble the EXP# you get and increase your #cWeapon Attack by 30 for 2 hour# with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: Twinkling golden dust. If you gather 50 of Star Dust, Gaga will exchange them to 1 Twinkling Star.

string.name: desc
string.value: Twinkling golden star. You can enter the Treasure Island by using one.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can present a Twinkling Star to someone in the same map. 1 box can give out 6 Twinkling Stars.

string.name: desc
string.value: It will increase the amount of #cEXP by 1.5 times for 1 hour#.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you use the #cMiracle Circulator# when this coupon is in your inventory, the chance of getting a #chigher ability rank# will be increased #c1.5 times#. And the coupon will be #cconsumed#.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you use the #cMiracle Circulator# when this coupon is in your inventory, the chance of getting a #chigher ability rank# will be increased #c2 times#. And the coupon will be #cconsumed#.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you use the #cMiracle Circulator# when this coupon is in your inventory, the chance of getting a #chigher ability rank# will be increased #c3 times#. And the coupon will be #cconsumed#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Spaceship] mount skill forever, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Spaceship] mount skill 90 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Black Wyvern] mount skill forever, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Black Wyvern] mount skill 90 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it to receive EXP x2 for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use it to receive Drop x2 for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: It fully recovers HP and MP, but if your maximum HP and MP exceed 99, 999, then 99,999 HP and MP will be restored.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #cupgraded equipment#.
More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10+ successes: 10%

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a special liquor. \nIt fully recovers HP and MP, but if your maximum HP and MP exceed 99, 999, then 99,999 HP and MP will be restored.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can use the [Gentle Rocinante Riding] riding skill for 7 days by double-clicking this. \n[Gentle Rocinante] allows you to double jump while riding, regardless of whether you possess the double jump skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can use the [Gentle Rocinante Riding] riding skill for 90 days by double-clicking this. \n[Gentle Rocinante] allows you to double jump while riding, regardless of whether you possess the double jump skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can use the [Gentle Rocinante Riding] riding skill for 7 days by double-clicking this. \n[Flying Gentle Rocinante] can fly freely.

string.value: You can use the [Gentle Rocinante Riding] riding skill for 90 days by double-clicking this. \n[Flying Gentle Rocinante] can fly freely.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can use the [Gentle Rocinante Riding] riding skill for 30 days by double-clicking this. \n[Flying Gentle Rocinante] can fly freely.
